short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the inner unicorn and reflect on the page background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is made just for fun. You can use it to change your web page background to one of the defined colors within the app. Have fun!
